channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: California Democrats unveil their new congressional map to counter Republicans
item.description: As the battle over partisan redistricting mounts, Democrats in California unveil a congressional map that could yield up to five new seats for their p...

item.title: At Trump’s Summit, No Deal on Ukraine, and No Consequence for Putin
item.description: President Trump’s failure to reach an accord on Ukraine only made his warm welcome for the Russian leader more striking.

item.title: Class-action suit claims Otter AI secretly records private work conversations
item.description: The suit claims the popular service may be recording and processing millions of users' private conversations without consent.

item.title: For Some Venetians, This Overgrown Island Is Paradise

item.title: Once Seen as Divisive, South Korea’s New Leader Tries for Charming
item.description: To South Koreans weary of the political polarization that led briefly to martial law, President Lee Jae Myung is showing a more human touch than his p...

item.title: Trump Administration Backs Off New Attempt to Widen Control of D.C. Police
item.description: The chief will remain after a lawsuit challenged the Justice Department’s attempt to install a new leader as part of an effort to put the agency under...

item.title: Tommy McLain, the King of Swamp Pop, Dies at 85
item.description: Playing a blend of rock, R&B and zydeco, he had a hit in 1966 with “Sweet Dreams” and inspired Elvis Costello, Nick Lowe and many others.

item.title: How Trump-Putin Summit Signals Return to Imperial Thinking
item.description: The two leaders are bringing some old-world approaches to bear on a 21st-century conflict.

item.title: Spain’s Old Ways May Show How to Keep Cool
item.description: The tradition of the siesta is no accident. Spain has been living with extreme heat for centuries, and its people have ways of coping.

item.title: Putin and Trump tout 'progress' despite no Ukraine peace deal
item.description: President Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin are meeting at a military base outside Anchorage, Alaska. We've got the latest.

item.title: When our inflation infeelings don’t match the CPI
